product_name: Ocean Kayak Comfort Zone Kayak Seat Back
long_description: Ah, sweet relief! The Comfort Zone(TM) seat back from Ocean Kayak turns your sit-on-top kayak into an extremely comfortable ride. The Ocean Kayak Comfort Zone kayak seat back supports your back thanks to its generous height. Extra cushioning seat offers welcome softness during all-day paddles; the Comfort Zone features the most cushioning of all Ocean Kayak seats. Tough nylon resists the rigors of kayaking, and built-in ventilation system cools and helps keep you dry. Adjustable straps on sides let you fine-tune backrest angle for a variety of comfort options.
short_description: Ah, sweet relief! The Comfort Zone(TM) seat back from Ocean Kayak turns your sit-on-top kayak into an extremely comfortable ride.
